title: How to Verify a Solution
text: If a point is a solution to a system, then it satisfies both equations.
speech: If a point is a solution to a system, then it satisfies both equations.

title: Plugging in the Point
text: Let us plug in the point. $$\frac{8}{7}+\frac{6}{7}=2$$. The first equation is satisfied. $$\frac{6}{7}=\frac{3}{4} \frac{8}{7}$$. The second equation is satisfied. The point is a solution.
